name: Workshop Scramble
description:
(⚠️ Workshop Scramble can be played in your browser, but is best experienced through the Android or Windows app!)

Help save the holidays.  Make toys for kids in Santa's workshop, then hop around the calendar to make Valentine's gifts in Cupid's workshop, and then give out Halloween candy from Jack's workshop—or eat it yourself to try to keep a sugar rush going!  Put the pieces of each request together, move them to the bottom conveyor belt, and ship them off—it's a simple task that quickly turns into a fast-paced scramble to assemble everything in time!
